comment: "Darapti", one of the syllogisms of Aristotelian logic. All ` ph ` is ` ps ` , all ` ph ` is ` ch ` , and some ` ph ` exist, therefore some ` ch ` is ` ps ` . In Aristotelian notation, AAI-3: MaP and MaS therefore SiP. For example, "All squares are rectangles" and "All squares are rhombuses", therefore "Some rhombuses are rectangles". (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 28-Aug-2016.) Reduce dependencies on axioms. (Revised by BJ, 16-Sep-2022.)
